pizzas.name: The Hellfire
pizzas.description: A pizza so hot, it might as well have come straight from the depths of Hell. Only the bravest dare to try.

pizzas.name: Hades Inferno
pizzas.description: Named after the Greek god of the underworld, this pizza brings a fiery depth of flavors, sure to test your resilience.

pizzas.name: Aborted Fetal matter
pizzas.description: A controversial pizza with a unique taste. Definitely not for the faint-hearted.

pizzas.name: Abbatoir floor scrapings
pizzas.description: This pizza is made with a delicious mix of ingredients that come straight from the abbatoir floor. Not for the squeamish!

pizzas.name: Planned Murder
pizzas.description: A pizza so spicy, it's almost criminal. Can you handle the heat?

pizzas.name: Triple Sinner
pizzas.description: This pizza is loaded with three types of meat, making it a favorite among carnivores.

pizzas.name: Baby Killer
pizzas.description: This pizza is not for the faint-hearted. With an extremely spicy taste, it's a true test of your spice tolerance.

pizzas.name: Demonic Veggie
pizzas.description: A horrifyingly delicious combination of fresh vegetables that will make you question your allegiance to meat.

pizzas.name: Tortured Hog
pizzas.description: An unorthodox combination of sweet pineapple and salty ham that is surprisingly sinful.

extras.name: Inferno Sauce
extras.description: Extra hot sauce made with the spiciest peppers in existence. Not for the weak!

extras.name: Cursed Chilli Flakes
extras.description: Add an extra kick to any pizza with these chilli flakes that have been cursed with extreme spiciness.

extras.name: Hellish Garlic Butter
extras.description: Extra garlic butter that's so good, it's almost sinful.

extras.name: Eternal Flame Peppers
extras.description: Incredibly hot peppers to add an extra layer of fire to your pizza.

extras.name: Satan's Shrooms
extras.description: Extra mushrooms marinated in a secret, spicy sauce. Deceptively hot!

crusts.name: Default Crust
crusts.description: A standard, perfectly baked crust that comes with every pizza at no extra cost.

crusts.name: Ashen Thin Crust
crusts.description: A thin, crispy crust blackened to perfection, bringing a taste of the underworld to your pizza.

crusts.name: Demonic Deep Dish
crusts.description: A deep dish crust with a sinful amount of extra cheese baked right into the base.

crusts.name: Inferno Stuffed Crust
crusts.description: Our traditional crust stuffed with a ring of molten hot cheese. It's devilishly good!
